code:
var trendingSlider=function trendingSlider(){var slider=document.querySelector(".trending__list");var isDown=false;var startX;var scrollLeft;var mouseDown=function mouseDown(e){isDown=true;slider.classList.add("active");startX=e.pageX-slider.offsetLeft;scrollLeft=slider.scrollLeft;};var mouseLeave=function mouseLeave(e){isDown=false;slider.classList.remove("active");};var mouseUp=function mouseUp(e){isDown=false;slider.classList.remove("active");};var mouseMove=function mouseMove(e){if(!isDown)return;e.preventDefault();var x=e.pageX-slider.offsetLeft;var walk=(x-startX)*3;//scroll-fast
slider.scrollLeft=scrollLeft-walk;};slider.addEventListener("mousedown",mouseDown);slider.addEventListener("mouseleave",mouseLeave);slider.addEventListener("mouseup",mouseUp);slider.addEventListener("mousemove",mouseMove);};export default trendingSlider;
